name: Facebook Conversion API Setup
description: Implemented Facebook Conversion API (CAPI) with both browser-side and server-side tracking on WordPress and Shopify. Ensured event deduplication, improved attribution accuracy, and optimized data flow for better ad performance.

sections.title: Server-Side Tracking with GTM Server + Meta Pixel
bullets: Built a GTM Server container hosted via Google Cloud for robust reliability
Configured Meta Pixel events with deduplication logic using `event_id` for browser + server sync
Created custom triggers to fire purchase, view content, and add-to-cart across both WordPress and Shopify
Verified event delivery using Meta Events Manager — saw immediate jump in matching precision

sections.title: Browser-Server Signal Blending for Accurate Attribution
bullets: Integrated browser-side GTM tags with Shopify checkout and WooCommerce forms
Used fallback logic to fire server-only events when browser fails due to ad blockers
Blended client & server events to feed Meta with complete visibility on user actions
Enabled advanced remarketing by preserving tracking across redirects and slow-loading pages
